name: Payment in-Lire Gateway 2 Steps Order
author: Eventi Telematici

sections.description:
The in-Lire plugin extends WooCommerce allowing you to pay through your in-Lire account.

Why choose in-Lire?

in-Lire has no setup fees, no monthly fees, no hidden costs.
sections.installation:
Please note, this gateway requires WooCommerce 2.6 and above.

Before to proceed with this installation, please remove the previous one.

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To
do an automatic install of, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Payment in-Lire Gateway” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our plugin you can view details about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our plugin and uploading it to your web server via your favorite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

Updating

Automatic updates should work like a charm; as always though, ensure you backup your site just in case.
